cards.title: Ascended Edifice
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
Reduce damage dealt to villain cards by 1.
cards.flavorText: With a thunderous crack, the structure{BR}tore upward and away, leaving an{BR}expanse of sky between The Stranger{BR}and Dendron's maniacal laughter.

cards.title: Churning Void
body: This card is indestructible.

At the start of the environment turn, this card deals the {H} targets with the highest HP X projectile damage each, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one. After all other start of turn effects have taken place, move this card 1 space to the right in the environment play area.
cards.flavorText: Quicksilver stared over the edge,{BR}unable to spot the ground through the{BR}violent clouds. “Bad time to mention that{BR}I hate heights?” she asked.

cards.title: Cut Loose
body: Increase all damage dealt by 1.
When a hero destroys a target, this card deals that hero {H} projectile damage and is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: Impact was knocked over by flying{BR}pieces of the crippled robot. “Put{BR}your toys away when you're done{BR}with them!” yelled Quicksilver.

cards.title: Flailing Wires
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the X+1 hero targets with the highest HP 1 lightning damage each, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
cards.flavorText: Piece by piece, the entire city was torn{BR}into the sky. In the crater below, an{BR}ancient temple was revealed, sundered{BR}by the event.

cards.title: Flying bus
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the X+1 hero targets with the highest HP {H} projectile damage each, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
cards.flavorText: Titan commented favorably on the{BR}speed of the public transit system{BR}as it ricocheted off his shoulder.

cards.title: Forgotten Djinn
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second highest HP X+2 melee damage, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
cards.flavorText: As the rising city exposed the{BR}temple's entrance, its guardian{BR}awakened: a djinn so old not even{BR}Malichae knew its name.

cards.title: Fractured Sky
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top 2 cards of the environment deck. Put one into play to the left of all cards in the environment play area, and the other into play to the right.
When an environment target is destroyed, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The destabilized anomaly left pieces{BR}of Akelabad drifting in a perpetual{BR}storm, whose intensity fluctuated{BR}constantly.

cards.title: Gemini Indra
body: Increase all lightning damage dealt by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 targets with the highest HP X+1 projectile damage each, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
cards.flavorText: The city had always possessed its share{BR}of strange criminals. After the event,{BR}they were quick to turn their abilities{BR}toward exploiting the situation.

cards.title: Gemini Maya
body: Increase all projectile damage dealt by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 targets with the highest HP X+1 lightning damage each, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
cards.flavorText: The Gemini Twins found a natural affinity{BR}for the new weather, prowling the{BR}floating ruins and stealing from{BR}abandoned Garotech warehouses.

cards.title: Geograv Locus
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by X, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: “In the wrong hands, it could tear{BR}the city apart!” he cried. The{BR}intruder only grinned. “Those are{BR}the hands that paid me.”

cards.title: Pressure Drop
body: When this card enters play, the hero with the lowest HP must discard X cards, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
At the start of the environment turn, if there are 3 environment cards to the right of this one, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The relentless wind and thinning{BR}atmosphere made breathing all but{BR}impossible. “How much higher does{BR}this go?” gasped Tempest.

cards.title: Ride the Currents
body: When this card enters play, select the deck with the least number of non-character cards in play. Put the top card of that deck into play.
At the start of the villain turn, you may move 1 environment card to a new location in the environment play area.
cards.flavorText: “You look different. New haircut?” asked{BR}the Stranger. As a claw shot towards{BR}him, he stepped backward and was{BR}whipped away by the corridor of wind.

cards.title: Scatterburst
body: On the turn this card enters play, after all other end of turn effects have taken place, shuffle all non-character villain cards from the villain play area and replace them in a random order. Do the same for environment cards in the environment play area.
Then, each hero target regains 1HP and this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: A blast of wind threw the madman's{BR}projections into disarray, as the{BR}team leapt from the hovering{BR}Kestrel to aid in the evacuation.

cards.title: Skulking intermediary
body: At the end of the environment turn, each environment and villain target regains X+1 HP, where X is the number of environment cards to the left of this one.
This card is immune to damage dealt by villain targets.
cards.flavorText: “Please, test the equipment,” it said. “We{BR}went to a great deal of trouble to{BR}procure it. Should make your job{BR}considerably easier.”

cards.title: Toppled Skyscraper
body: The first time a villain target would be dealt damage each turn, redirect it to this card.
At the start of each hero’s turn, they may choose what order to perform that turn's play, power, and draw phases in.
cards.flavorText: “Hold it, this could get bodgy,” Echelon{BR}said. The aircraft dove beneath the{BR}crumbling skyscraper, cutting off sight{BR}of the trailing Tiamat.
